name: Bellscoin (Vaulted)
description: BELLS is DOGE's daddy, created by Billy Markus 8 days before Dogecoin. Bellscoin is a 2013 PoW Layer 1 blockchain resurrected by Adam McBride and Luke Wright in December 2023 and now has more Ordinal inscriptions than the Bitcoin network. This is a wrapped form of BELLS on Ethereum via the Televault protocol called Vaulted Bellscoin.
